Getting Started
==========================================

launch the application
**********************

You have to click on the shortcut or launch the .py script in the installation folder.


Record yourself
***************

In front of you, there should be a big button with a mic on it.
You can press it it's safe, there isn't any nuclear things that will be put on your account.
It's a press to record button, so as soon as you put off your finger from the left click of your mouse, your voice will stopped to be recorded.

Score Screen
************

In the next window, there is the score related to the recording that is displayed.
You have two clefs which represent the whole palette of the human voice.

below you'll find (from left to right):

* A mic button to record yourself again (that will erase all the current work)
* A play button so that you can hear you lovely voice transformed into an electronic piano which will try to perform as good as you did
* An send to by email button that allow you to send the MIDI file to your mail address (Hotmail, Outlook, Gmail supported only)
* A save to folder button that can save you MIDI file in wherever you want your perfection to be preserved
